name: places/ChIJcRPnPYxZwokRinGHrt47Zxc
adrFormatAddress: 928 Broadway #301, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: A remarkable Dermatologist. She listens well, she explains every procedure calmly and professionally. You will be treated with care and your issues will be resolved.

text.text: A remarkable Dermatologist. She listens well, she explains every procedure calmly and professionally. You will be treated with care and your issues will be resolved.

originalText.text: Dr. Vine is absolutely lovely and has taken care of my skin for years. Can't speak highly enough of her table side manner and attention to detail. She is one of the only doctor's I know who actually remembers things about my life year-to-year. I have terrible freelancers insurance (a.k.a., it covers nothing), and the front desk has worked diligently to make sure my monthly bills are manageable and automatically paid. Wish I could give 6-stars!

originalText.text: I just read a review of Dr. Vine by a loyal patient and I get it.  I truly believe the best about her that she was a beautiful person and a good doctor.   I was savagely assaulted at the office she rented and shared space with her sister they rented from Dr Fagelman.   Her receptionist a witness would not speak up for me I try to tell myself she was pregnant but if I was pregnant I would've spoken up I would've done the right thing.  Dr Fagelman and Delita Hooks  committed perjury in a civil lawsuit completely fearless of any accountability as if the judge would protect their wrongdoing.   They lied about when Dr Vine and her sister Dr Dacko moved out. Please Google Dr Fagelman assault.  Dr Vine  told me she went to doctor Fagelman  demanded in my attacker Delita Hooks be fired.  I believe her and that Dr Fagelman committed  perjury but does Dr. Vine and Dr Dacko care that Dr Fagelman lied about when they moved out and that Dr Vine never confronted him and demanded Delita Hooks be fired and lied about so much more?

originalText.text: Professional and empathetic. Called to follow up on how I was doing which I really appreciated. Truly cares about her patients.

originalText.text: Recommend Dr Vine as she has manner and is very thorough.   We had a problem with the bill and they were able to resolve it for us.
